ii (nation park) john moulton barn teton rang locat teton county, wyoming, usa nearest&#160;c jackson coordin 43°50′00″n 110°42′03″w﻿ / ﻿43.83333°n 110.70083°w﻿ / 43.83333; -110.70083coordinates: 43°50′00″n 110°42′03″w﻿ / ﻿43.83333°n 110.70083°w﻿ / 43.83333; -110.70083[1] area 310,000 acr (480&#160;sq&#160;mi; 130,000&#160;ha; 1,300&#160;km2)[2] establish februari 26, 1929 visitor 2,791,392 (in&#160;2014)[3] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic grand teton nation park unit state nation park northwestern wyoming. approxim 310,000 acr (480&#160;sq&#160;mi; 130,000&#160;ha; 1,300&#160;km2), park includ major peak 40-mile-long (64&#160;km) teton rang well northern section valley known jackson hole. 10 mile (16&#160;km) south yellowston nation park, connect nation park service-manag john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway. along surround nation forests, three protect area constitut almost 18,000,000-acr (7,300,000&#160;ha) greater yellowston ecosystem, one largest intact mid-latitud temper ecosystem world. human histori grand teton region date back least 11,000&#160;years, first nomad hunter-gather paleo-indian began migrat region warmer month pursu food supplies. earli 19th&#160;century, first white explor encount eastern shoshon natives. 1810 1840, region attract fur trade compani vie control lucr beaver pelt trade. u.s. govern expedit region commenc mid-19th&#160;centuri offshoot explor yellowstone, first perman white settler jackson hole arriv 1880s. effort preserv region nation park commenc late 19th&#160;century, 1929 grand teton nation park established, protect major peak teton range. valley jackson hole remain privat ownership 1930s, conservationist led john d. rockefeller, jr. began purchas land jackson hole ad exist nation park. public opinion repeat congression effort repeal measures, much jackson hole set asid protect jackson hole nation monument 1943. monument abolish 1950 monument land ad grand teton nation park. grand teton nation park name grand teton, tallest mountain teton range. name mountain attribut earli 19th-centuri french-speak trappers—l troi téton (the three teats) later anglic shorten tetons. 13,775 feet (4,199&#160;m), grand teton abruptli rise 7,000 feet (2,100&#160;m) jackson hole, almost 850 feet (260&#160;m) higher mount owen, second-highest summit range. park numer lakes, includ 15-mile-long (24&#160;km) jackson lake well stream vari length upper main stem snake river. though state recession, dozen small glacier persist higher elev near highest peak range. rock park oldest found u.s. nation park date nearli 2.7&#160;billion years. grand teton nation park almost pristin ecosystem speci flora fauna exist sinc prehistor time still found there. 1,000&#160;speci vascular plants, dozen speci mammals, 300 speci birds, dozen fish speci speci reptil amphibian exist. due variou chang ecosystem, human-induced, effort made provid enhanc protect speci nativ fish increasingli threaten whitebark pine. grand teton nation park popular destin mountaineering, hiking, fish form recreation. 1,000&#160;drive-in campsit 200 mile (320&#160;km) hike trail provid access backcountri camp areas. note world-renown trout fishing, park one place catch snake river fine-spot cutthroat trout. grand teton sever nation park service-run visitor centers, privat oper concess motels, lodges, ga station marinas. content 1 human histori 1.1 paleo-indian nativ american 1.2 fur trade explor 1.3 organ explor settlement 1.4 establish park 1.5 histori mountain 2 park manag 3 geographi 3.1 teton rang 3.2 jackson hole 3.3 lake river 3.4 glaciat 4 geolog 5 ecolog 5.1 flora 5.2 fauna 5.3 fire ecolog 5.4 climat 5.5 air water qualiti 6 recreat 6.1 mountain 6.2 camp hike 6.3 boat fish 6.4 winter activ 7 tourism 7.1 visitor center 7.2 accommod 8 refer 9 extern link human history[edit] paleo-indian nativ americans[edit] shoshon encamp wyoming, photograph w. h. jackson, 1870 paleo-indian presenc grand teton nation park date back 11,000 years.[4] jackson hole valley climat time colder alpin semi-arid climat found today, first human migratori hunter-gather spend summer month jackson hole winter valley west teton range. along shore jackson lake, fire pits, tool thought fish weight discovered. one tool found type associ clovi culture, tool cultur period date back least 11,500&#160;years. tool made obsidian chemic analysi indic came sourc near present-day teton pass, south grand teton nation park.[4] though obsidian also avail north jackson hole, virtual obsidian spear point found sourc south, indic main season migratori rout paleo-indian direction.[5] elk, winter nation elk refug southern end jackson hole northwest higher altitud spring summer, follow similar migratori pattern day.[6] 11,000 500&#160;year ago, littl evid chang migratori pattern amongst nativ american group region evid indic perman human settlement.[5] white american explor first enter region first decad 19th century, encount eastern tribe shoshon people.[7] shoshon live mountain vast greater yellowston region continu pedestrian group shoshon resid lower elev limit use horses. mountain-dwel shoshon known "sheep-eaters" "tukudika" refer themselves, sinc stapl diet bighorn sheep.[7][8] shoshon continu follow migratori pattern predecessor document close spiritu relationship teton range. number stone enclosur peaks, includ upper slope grand teton (known simpli enclosure) thought use shoshon vision quests.[9] teton yellowston region shoshon reloc wind river indian reserv establish 1868.[7] reserv situat 100&#160;mi (160&#160;km) southeast jackson hole land select chief washakie.[10] fur trade exploration[edit] lewi clark expedit (1804–1806) pass well north grand teton region. return trip pacif ocean, expedit member john colter given earli discharg could join two fur trapper head west search beaver pelts. colter later hire manuel lisa lead fur trapper explor region around yellowston river. winter 1807/08 colter pass jackson hole first caucasian see teton range.[11] lewi clark expedit co-lead william clark produc map base previou expedit includ explor john colter 1807, appar base discuss clark colter two met st. louis, missouri 1810.[12] anoth map attribut william clark indic john colter enter jackson hole northeast, cross continent divid either togwote pass union pass left region cross teton pass, follow well establish nativ american trails.[13] 1931, colter stone, rock carv shape head inscript "john colter" one side year "1808" other, discov field tetonia, idaho, west teton pass. colter stone authent creat john colter may work later expedit region.[13] enigmat colter stone, inscript "john colter", found field eastern idaho 1931. john colter wide consid first mountain man and, like came jackson hole region next 30&#160;years, primarili profit fur trapping; region rich highli sought pelt beaver fur bear animals. 1810 1812, astorian travel jackson hole cross teton pass head east 1812.[14] 1810, american british fur trade compani competit control north american fur trade, american sovereignti region secur sign oregon treati 1846. one parti employ british north west compani led explor donald mackenzi enter jackson hole west 1818 1819. tetons, well valley west teton rang known today pierre' hole, may name french speak iroquoi french canadian trapper part mackenzie' party.[15] earlier parti refer promin peak teton rang pilot knobs. french trappers' le troi téton (the three breasts) later shorten tetons.[16] form mid-1820s, rocki mountain fur compani partnership includ jedediah smith, william sublett david edward jackson "davey jackson". jackson oversaw trap oper teton region 1826 1830. sublett name valley east teton rang "jackson' hole" (later simpli jackson hole) davey jackson.[13][17] demand beaver fur declin variou region american west becam deplet beaver due trapping, american fur trade compani folded; however, individu mountain men continu trap beaver region 1840.[13] mid-1840 1860, jackson hole teton rang gener devoid small popul nativ american tribe alreadi there. overland human migrat rout oregon mormon trail cross south pass, well south teton range, caucasian influenc teton region minim u.s. govern commenc organ explorations.[13] organ explor settlement[edit] "the three tetons" seen west teton rang member hayden geolog survey 1872. one earliest photograph teton rang taken william henri jackson 1872. main article: histor build structur grand teton nation park first u.s. govern sponsor expedit enter jackson hole 1859–60 raynold expedition. led u.s. armi captain william f. raynold guid mountain man jim bridger, includ naturalist f. v. hayden, later led expedit region.[18] expedit charg explor yellowston region, encount difficulti cross mountain pass due snow. bridger end guid expedit south union pass follow gro ventr river drainag snake river leav region teton pass.[19] organ explor region halt american civil war resum f. v. hayden led well-fund hayden geolog survey 1871. 1872, hayden oversaw explor yellowstone, branch expedit known snake river divis led jame stevenson explor teton region. along stevenson photograph william henri jackson took first photograph teton range.[9] hayden geolog survey name mani mountain lake region.[20] explor earli mountain men subsequ expedit fail identifi sourc econom viabl miner wealth. nevertheless, small group prospector set claim mine oper sever creek rivers. 1900 organ effort retriev miner abandoned.[21] though teton rang never perman inhabited, pioneer began settl jackson hole valley east rang 1884.[22] earliest homestead mostli singl men endur long winters, short grow season rocki soil hard cultivate. region mostli suit cultiv hay cattl ranching. 1890, jackson hole estim perman popul 60.[23] menor' ferri built 1892 near present-day moose, wyom provid access wagon west side snake river.[24] ranch increas significantli 1900 1920, seri agricultur relat econom downturn earli 1920 left mani rancher destitute.[25] begin 1920s, automobil provid faster easier access area natur beauti old militari road jackson hole teton togwote pass improv accommod increas vehicl traffic. respons increas tourism, dude ranch established, new exist cattl ranches, urban travel could experi life cattleman.[26] establish park[edit] main article: establish grand teton nation park grand teton nation park dedic 1929 north jackson hole, yellowston nation park establish 1872, close 19th century, conservationist want expand boundari park includ least teton range.[27][28] 1907, effort regul water flow irrig purposes, u.s. bureau reclam construct log crib dam snake river outlet jackson lake. dam fail 1910 new concret jackson lake dam replac 1911. dam enlarg 1916, rais lake water 39&#160;ft (12&#160;m) part minidoka project, design provid irrig agricultur state idaho.[29][30] dam construct plan lake teton rang alarm yellowston nation park superintend horac albright, sought block efforts.[31] jackson hole resid oppos expans yellowstone, favor establish separ nation park would includ teton rang six lake base mountains. congression approval, presid calvin coolidg sign execut order establish 96,000-acr (39,000&#160;ha) grand teton nation park februari 26, 1929.[32] valley jackson hole remain primarili privat ownership john d. rockefeller, jr. wife visit region late 1920s.[28] horac albright rockefel discuss way preserv jackson hole commerci exploitation, consequence, rockefel start buy jackson hole properti snake river land compani purpos later turn nation park service. 1930, plan reveal resid region met strong disapproval.[28] congression effort prevent expans grand teton nation park end put snake river land company' hold limbo. 1942 rockefel becom increasingli impati purchas properti might never ad park, wrote secretari interior harold l. ick consid sell land anoth party.[33] secretari ick recommend presid franklin roosevelt antiqu act, permit presid set asid land protect without approv congress, use establish nation monument jackson hole. roosevelt creat 221,000-acr (89,000&#160;ha) jackson hole nation monument 1943, use land donat snake river land compani ad addit properti teton nation forest.[34] monument park adjac administ nation park service, monument design ensur fund allotment, provid level resourc protect equal park. member congress repeatedli attempt new nation monument abolished.[35] end world war ii nation public sentiment favor ad monument park, though still much local opposition, monument park combin 1950.[31] recognit john d. rockefeller, jr.' effort establish expand grand teton nation park, 24,000-acr (9,700&#160;ha) parcel land grand teton yellowston nation park ad nation park servic 1972. land road southern boundari park west thumb yellowston nation park name john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway.[36] rockefel famili own jy ranch, border grand teton nation park southwest. novemb 2007, rockefel famili transfer ownership ranch park establish lauranc s. rockefel preserve, dedic june 21, 2008.[37][38] histori mountaineering[edit] imag taken william o. owen 1898, climb partner john shive, franklin spalding, frank petersen depict top grand teton. last 25&#160;year 19th century, mountain teton rang becam focal point explor want claim first ascent peaks. however, white explor may first climb mani peak earliest first ascent even formid grand teton might achiev long written histori document it. nativ american relic remain includ enclosure, obvious man-mad structur locat 530&#160;ft (160&#160;m) summit grand teton point near upper saddl (13,160&#160;ft (4,010&#160;m)).[39][40] nathaniel p. langford jame stevenson, member hayden geolog survey 1872, found enclosur earli attempt summit grand teton. langford claim stevenson climb grand teton, vagu whether made summit. report obstacl sight never corrobor later parties. langford stevenson like get much enclosure.[9] first ascent grand teton substanti made william o. owen, frank petersen, john shive franklin spencer spald august 11, 1898.[39] owen made two previou attempt peak publish sever account first ascent, discredit claim langford stevenson ever reach beyond enclosur 1872. disagr parti first reach top grand teton may greatest controversi histori american mountaineering.[9] 1898 ascent grand teton record 1923.[41] mid-1930s, dozen differ climb rout establish grand teton includ northeast ridg 1931 glenn exum. glenn exum team anoth note climber name paul petzoldt found exum mountain guid 1931.[42] major peak teton range, climb late 1930 includ mount moran 1922 mount owen 1930 fritiof fryxel other numer previou attempt failed.[41] middl south teton first climb day, august 29, 1923, group climber led albert r. ellingwood.[41] new rout peak explor safeti equip skill improv eventu climb rate 5.9 yosemit decim system difficulti scale establish grand teton. classic climb follow rout first pioneer owen, known owen-spald route, rate 5.4 due combin concern beyond gradient alone.[9] rock climb boulder becom popular park mid 20th century. late 1950s, gymnast john gill came park start climb larg boulder near jenni lake. gill approach climb gymnast perspect teton becam first known climber histori use gymnast chalk improv handhold keep hand dri climbing.[43] latter decad 20th century, extrem difficult cliff explor includ death canyon, mid-1990s, 800 differ climb rout document variou peak canyon cliffs.[9][44] park management[edit] sunset grand teton grand teton nation park one ten visit nation park u.s., averag 2.5&#160;million visitor annually.[45] nation park servic feder agenc unit state depart interior manag grand teton nation park john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway. grand teton nation park averag 100 perman 180 season employees. park also manag 27 concess contract provid servic lodging, restaurants, mountain guides, dude ranching, fish boat shuttl jenni lake.[46] nation park servic work close feder agenc u.s. forest service, u.s. fish wildlif service, bureau reclamation, also, consequ jackson hole airport' presenc park, feder aviat administration. initi construct airstrip north town jackson complet 1930s.[47] jackson hole nation monument designated, airport insid it. monument park combined, jackson hole airport becam commerci airport within u.s. nation park. jackson hole airport strictest nois abat regul airport u.s.[47] airport night flight curfew overflight restrictions, pilot expect approach depart airport along east, south southwest flight corridors.[48] 2010, 110 privat own properti inholdings, mani belong state wyoming, locat within grand teton nation park. effort purchas trade inhold feder land ongo partnership entities, 10&#160;million dollar hope rais acquir privat inhold 2016.[49] moni alloc congress via land water conserv fund, grand teton nation park may get money need fund divid four differ feder agencies. effort exchang feder land area inhold still negoti phase 2012.[50] geography[edit] map grand teton nation park also see resolut adjust pdf map grand teton nation park locat northwestern region u.s. state wyoming.[51] north park border john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway, administ grand teton nation park. scenic highway name pass southern boundari grand teton nation park west thumb yellowston nation park.[36] grand teton nation park cover approxim 310,000 acr (130,000&#160;ha), john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway includ 23,700 acr (9,600&#160;ha).[52] jackson hole valley virtual major mountain peak teton rang within park. jedediah smith wilder caribou-targhe nation forest lie along western boundari includ western slope teton range. northeast east lie teton wilder gro ventr wilder bridger-teton nation forest.[53] nation elk refug southeast, migrat herd elk winter there. privat own land border park south southwest. grand teton nation park, along yellowston nation park, surround nation forest relat protect area constitut 18,000,000-acr (7,300,000&#160;ha) (28,000&#160;sq&#160;mi (73,000&#160;km2)) greater yellowston ecosystem. greater yellowston ecosystem span across portion three state one largest intact mid-latitud ecosystem remain earth.[54] road, grand teton nation park 290&#160;mi (470&#160;km) salt lake city, utah 550&#160;mi (890&#160;km) denver, colorado.[55] teton range[edit] main articles: teton rang canyon teton rang youngest mountain rang rocki mountains, teton rang began form 6 9&#160;million year ago.[56] run roughli north south rise floor jackson hole without foothil along 40&#160;mi (64&#160;km) long 7 9&#160;mi (11 14&#160;km) wide activ fault-block mountain front.[52] rang tilt westward, rise abruptli jackson hole valley lie east gradual teton valley west. seri earthquak along teton fault slowli displac western side fault upward eastern side fault downward averag 1 foot (30&#160;cm) displac everi 300–400&#160;years.[56] displac fault occur last 2&#160;million years.[57] fault experienc 7.5–earthquak magnitud event sinc formed, rel quiescent histor periods, 5.0–magnitud greater earthquak known occur sinc 1850.[58] fault-block mountain format teton rang jackson hole addit 13,775&#160;ft (4,199&#160;m) high grand teton, anoth nine peak 12,000&#160;ft (3,700&#160;m) sea level.[59] eight peak avalanch cascad canyon make often-photograph cathedr group.[60] promin peak north cascad canyon monolith mount moran (12,605&#160;ft (3,842&#160;m)) rise 5,728&#160;ft (1,746&#160;m) jackson lake.[61] north mount moran, rang eventu merg high altitud yellowston plateau. south central cathedr group teton rang taper near teton pass blend snake river range.[62] west east trend canyon provid easier access foot heart rang vehicular road travers rang except teton pass, south park. carv combin glacier activ well numer streams, canyon lowest point along eastern margin rang jackson hole.[63] flow higher lower elevations, glacier creat dozen u-shap valley throughout range.[64] cascad canyon sandwich mount owen teewinot mountain south symmetri spire north situat immedi west jenni lake. north south, webb, moran, paintbrush, cascade, death granit canyon slice teton range. jackson hole[edit] main article: jackson hole teton fault near base rockchuck peak creat nearli horizont line tree foreground. jackson hole 55&#160;mi (89&#160;km) long 6 13&#160;mi (10 21&#160;km) wide graben valley averag elev 6,800&#160;ft (2,100&#160;m), lowest point near southern park boundari 6,350&#160;ft (1,940&#160;m).[65] valley sit east teton rang vertic displac downward 30,000&#160;ft (9,100&#160;m), make teton fault parallel twin east side valley normal fault jackson hole block hang wall teton mountain block footwall.[66] grand teton nation park contain major part blocks. eros rang provid sediment valley topograph relief 7,700&#160;ft (2,300&#160;m).[56] jackson hole compar flat, modest increas altitud south north, howev isol butt blacktail butt hill includ signal mountain dot valley floor.[62] addit outcroppings, snake river erod terrac jackson hole. southeast jackson lake, glacial depress known kettl numerous. kettl form ice situat gravel outwash ice sheet melt glacier retreated.[67] lake rivers[edit] main article: snake river oxbow bend snake river lake park form glacier largest lake locat base teton range.[68] northern section park lie jackson lake, largest lake park 15&#160;mi (24&#160;km) length, 5&#160;mi (8.0&#160;km) wide 438&#160;ft (134&#160;m) deep.[52] though jackson lake natural, jackson lake dam construct outlet creation park lake level rais almost 40&#160;ft (12&#160;m) consequently.[29] east jackson lake lodg lie emma matilda two ocean lakes. south jackson lake, leigh, jenny, bradley, taggart phelp lake rest outlet canyon lead teton range. within teton range, small alpin lake cirqu common, 100 scatter throughout high country.[69] lake solitude, locat elev 9,035&#160;ft (2,754&#160;m), cirqu head north fork cascad canyon. high altitud lake found 10,000&#160;ft (3,000&#160;m) elev few, iceflo lake, remain ice clog much year.[70] park note larg waterfalls; however, 100-foot (30&#160;m) high hidden fall west jenni lake easi reach short hike.[71] headwat two ocean plateau yellowston nation park, snake river flow north south park, enter jackson lake near boundari grand teton nation park john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway.[72] snake river flow spillway jackson lake dam southward jackson hole, exit park west jackson hole airport.[72] largest lake park drain either directli tributari stream snake river. major tributari flow snake river includ pacif creek buffalo fork near moran gro ventr river southern border park. compar level jackson hole valley, snake river descend averag 19 feet per mile (3.6&#160;m/km), stream descend mountain east west higher gradient due increas slope.[56] snake river creat braid channel section gradient lower steeper sections, erod undercut cobbleston terrac deposit glaciers.[56] glaciation[edit] middl teton glacier northeast slope middl teton numer crevasses. major peak teton rang carv current shape long vanish glaciers. commenc 250,000–150,000&#160;year ago, teton went sever period glaciat area jackson hole cover glacier 2,000&#160;ft (610&#160;m) thick.[56][73] heavi glaciat unrel uplift rang instead part period global cool known quaternari glaciation.[73] begin buffalo glaciat follow bull lake pinedal glaciation, end roughli 15,000&#160;year ago, landscap greatli impact glacial activity. pinedal glaciation, landscap visibl today creat glacier yellowston plateau flow south form jackson lake, smaller glacier descend teton rang push rock morain canyon left behind lake near base mountains.[73] peak carv horn arêt canyon transform water-erod v-shape glacier-carv u-shap valleys.[56] approxim dozen glacier current exist park, ancient reestablish sometim 1400 1850&#160;ad littl ice age.[74] recent glaciers, largest teton glacier, sit northeast face grand teton. teton glacier 3,500&#160;ft (1,100&#160;m) long 1,100&#160;ft (340&#160;m) wide, nearli surround tallest summit range.[73] teton glacier also best studi glacier range, research conclud 2005 glacier could disappear 30 75&#160;years.[66] west cathedr group near hurrican pass, schoolroom glacier tini well defin termin later moraines, small proglaci lake typic glacier featur close proxim other.[75] geology[edit] main article: geolog grand teton area geolog featur known black dike diabas intrus older gneiss visibl east face middl teton dark line bisect peak. grand teton nation park ancient rock found u.s. nation park. oldest rock date far 2,680 ± 12&#160;million year old, though even older rock believ exist park.[66] form archean eon (4 2.5&#160;billion year ago), metamorph rock includ gneiss, schist amphibolites.[66] metamorph rock common type found northern southern section teton range.[76] 2,545&#160;million year ago, metamorph rock intrud igneou granit rocks, visibl central teton includ grand teton nearbi peaks.[66] light color granit central teton rang contrast darker metamorph gneiss found flank mount moran north.[76] magma intrus diabas rock 765&#160;million year ago left dike seen east face mount moran middl teton.[66] granit pegmatit intrus also work way fissur older gneiss.[76] precambrian rock jackson hole buri deep compar recent tertiari volcan sedimentari deposits, well pleistocen glacial deposits.[77] close precambrian, region intermitt submerg shallow seas, 500&#160;million year variou type sedimentari rock formed.[76] paleozo (542 251&#160;million year ago) sandstone, shale, limeston dolomit deposited.[78] though sedimentari rock sinc erod away central teton range, still evid northern, southern western flank range.[79] one notabl except sandston flathead format continu cap mount moran.[66][78] sedimentari layer rock alaska basin, western border grand teton nation park, chronicl 120&#160;million year period sedimentari deposition.[78] fossil found sedimentari rock park includ algae, brachiopod trilobites.[79] sedimentari deposit continu mesozo (250–66&#160;million year ago) coal seam found sedimentari rock strata indic region dens forest era.[80] numer coal seam 5 10&#160;ft (1.5 3.0&#160;m) thick interspers siltstone, clayston sedimentari rocks. late cretaceous, volcan arc west region deposit fine grain ash later form bentonite, import miner resource.[80] end mesozo present, region went seri uplift erosion sequences. commenc 66&#160;million year ago laramid orogeni period mountain-build eros western north america creat ancestr rocki mountains.[80] cycl uplift eros left behind one complet non-marin cenozo rock sequenc found north america.[81] conglomer rock compos quartzit interspers mudston sandston deposit eros vanish mountain rang exist northwest current teton range. deposit also trace quantiti gold mercury.[81] eocen oligocene, volcan erupt ancestr absaroka rang buri region variou volcan deposits.[81] sedimentari basin develop region due drop faulting, creat ancestr jackson hole pliocen (10&#160;million year ago), ancestr jackson lake known teewinot lake.[77] quaternary, landslides, eros glacial activ deposit soil rock debri throughout snake river valley jackson hole left behind termin morain impound current lakes.[69][73] recent exampl rapid alter landscap occur 1925 east park, gro ventr landslid trigger spring melt heavi snowpack well heavi rain.[82] ecology[edit] flora[edit] low larkspur one hundr flower speci found park. grand teton nation park surround region host 1000 speci vascular plants.[83] altitud varianc 7,000&#160;ft (2,100&#160;m), park number differ ecolog zone includ alpin tundra, rocki mountain subalpin zone spruce-fir forest dominant, valley floor, mix conif decidu forest zone occupi region better soil intermix sagebrush plain atop alluvi deposits.[84] additionally, wetland near lake valley floor adjac river stream cover larg expanses, especi along snake river near oxbow bend near moran willow flat near jackson lake lodge.[85] altitude, avail soils, wildfir incidence, avalanch human activ direct impact type plant speci immedi area.[86] variou nich overlap known ecotone.[87] rang altitud grand teton nation park impact type plant speci found variou elevations. alpin zone tree line, grand teton nation park approxim 10,000&#160;ft (3,000&#160;m), tundra condit prevail.[88] treeless region, hundr speci grass, wildflower, moss lichen found.[89][90] subalpin region tree line base mountains, whitebark pine, limber pine, subalpin fir, engelmann spruce dominant.[87] valley floor, lodgepol pine common rocki mountain douglas-fir, blue spruce inhabit drier areas, aspen, cottonwood, alder, willow commonli found around lakes, stream wetlands.[87] however, tableland snake river channel mostli sagebrush plain term acreag widespread habitat park.[91] sagebrush plain flat 100 speci grass wildflowers. slightli elev section plain northern section jackson hole form forest island one obviou exampl timber island. ecotone, forest island surround sagebrush expans provid shelter variou anim speci day nearbi grass night time foraging.[91] purpl cone whitebark pine protect seed import food sourc number species. flora grand teton nation park gener healthy, whitebark pine, lesser degre lodgepol pine, consid risk. case whitebark pine, invas speci fungu known white pine blister rust weaken tree, make suscept destruct endem mountain pine beetles.[92] whitebark pine gener thrive elev 8,000&#160;ft (2,400&#160;m) produc larg seed high fat content import food sourc variou speci grizzli bear, red squirrel clark' nutcracker.[93] speci consid keyston foundat species; keyston "ecolog role (is) disproportion larg rel abundance"[94] foundat paramount role "defin ecosystem structure, function, process".[94] whitebark pine gener lower incid blister rust infect throughout greater yellowston ecosystem region glacier nation park cascad range. incid blister rust whitebark pine yellowston nation park slightli lower grand teton.[93] though blister rust caus increas mortality, weaken effect tree allow nativ pine beetl easili infest trees, increas mortality. gener practic nation park allow natur take course, alarm trend increas diseas mortal vital whitebark pine tree spark collabor effort amongst variou govern entiti interven protect species.[94] fauna[edit] see also: mammal grand teton nation park though mountain lion present grand teton, rare seen. sixty-on speci mammal record grand teton nation park.[91] includ gray wolf, extirp region earli 1900 migrat grand teton nation park adjac yellowston nation park speci reintroduc there.[95] re-establish wolv ensur everi indigen mammal speci exist park.[96] addit gray wolves, anoth 17 speci carnivor resid within grand teton nation park includ grizzli commonli seen american black bear. rel common sight coyote, river otter, marten badger occasion sight mountain lion, lynx wolverin report annually.[91] number rodent speci exist includ yellow-belli marmot, least chipmunk, muskrat, beaver, uinta ground squirrel, pika, snowsho hare, porcupine, six speci bats.[91] larger mammal common elk, exist thousands.[97] migrat rout nation elk refug yellowston nation park grand teton nation park, easili seen anytim year, numer spring fall. ungul includ bison pronghorn—th fastest land mammal western hemisphere—which found throughout jackson hole moose, tend stay near waterway wetlands.[91] 100–125 bighorn sheep dwell alpin rocki zone peaks.[91][98] moos near leigh lake 300 speci bird sight park includ calliop hummingbird, smallest bird speci north america, well trumpet swans, north america' largest waterfowl.[99] addit trumpet swans, anoth 30 speci waterfowl record includ blue-wing teal, common merganser, american wigeon color reclus harlequin duck occasion spot cascad canyon.[100] bald golden eagl bird prey osprey, red-tail hawk, american kestrel occasion sight peregrin falcon reported.[101] 14 speci owl reported, common great horn owl, though boreal owl great grey owl also seen occasionally.[101] dozen speci woodpeck reported, similar number speci warblers, plover gulls.[101] vocal gregari black-bil magpi frequent campground steller' jay clark' nutcrack found backcountry. sage cover plain jackson hole favor area sage grouse, brewer' sparrow sage thrashers, wetland frequent great blue heron, american white pelican, sandhil crane rare occas endang relative, whoop crane.[100][101] snake river fine-spot cutthroat trout tini black spot body. snake river fine-spot cutthroat trout (or snake river cutthroat trout) nativ trout speci grand teton nation park.[102] also subspeci cutthroat trout exclus nativ larg stream rivers. variou research abl identifi genet differ snake river fine-spot cutthroat trout yellowston cutthroat trout, though term appearances, snake river subspeci much smaller spot cover greater portion body, two subspeci inhabit differ ecolog niches.[103] snake river fine-spot cutthroat trout identifi research separ subspeci mid-1990s, manag distinct subspeci state wyoming, yet recogn neighbor state idaho montana.[103][104] snake river fine-spot cutthroat trout found snake river tributari jackson lake dam palisad reservoir idaho. non-n speci trout rainbow trout lake trout introduc wyom fish game depart migrat yellowstone.[105] today five trout speci inhabit park waters.[102] nativ speci fish includ mountain whitefish, longnos dace, mountain sucker non-n speci includ utah chub arctic grayling.[102] american bison graze jackson hole four speci reptil document park: three speci snake wander garter snake, less commonli seen valley garter snake rubber boa, well one lizard species, northern sagebrush lizard, first report 1992. none speci venomous.[106] six amphibian speci document includ columbia spot frog, boreal choru frog, tiger salamand increasingli rare boreal toad northern leopard frog.[107][108] sixth amphibian species, bullfrog, introduced.[107] estim 10,000 insect speci frequent park; pollin plants, provid food sourc birds, fish, mammal animals, help decomposit wood.[109] one exampl import insect ecosystem, swarm armi cutworm moth die huge number mate provid high fat protein diet bear predators.[109] one studi conclud moth speci available, bear consum 40,000 moth per day roughli 20,000&#160;kcal/day.[110] grand teton nation park u.s. nation park permit hunting, elk effort keep popul speci regulated. provis includ legisl combin jackson hole nation monument grand teton nation park 1950.[111] nation park alaska permit subsist hunt indigen nativ nation park servic manag area allow hunt highli regul circumstances, hunt u.s. nation park gener allowed.[111][112] grand teton nation park, hunter requir obtain wyom hunt licens deput park rangers. hunt restrict area east snake river north moran, wyoming, hunt permit east u.s. rout 89.[111] propon continu elk hunt, occur fall, argu elk herd would becom overpopul without it, lead veget degrad overgraz elk herds.[111][113] oppon cite increas predat wolf grizzli bear grand teton nation park, render annual hunt unnecessari expos hunter attack grizzli bear becom accustom feed remain left behind hunt.[114] fire ecology[edit] forest fire near beaver creek role wildfir import one plant anim speci diversity.[115] mani tree speci evolv mainli germin wildfire. region park experienc wildfir histor time greater speci divers reestablish region influenc fire.[115][116] though yellowston fire 1988 minim impact grand teton nation park, studi conduct reaffirm event conclud suppress natur wildfir middl part 20th centuri decreas plant speci divers natur regener plant communities. one studi conduct 15 year 1988 yellowston nation park fire conclud human suppress wildfir advers impact aspen tree grove forest types.[117] major conif speci grand teton nation park heavili depend wildfir particularli true lodgepol pine.[118] though extrem hot canopi crown fire tend kill lodgepol pine seeds, lower sever surfac fire usual result higher post wildfir regener species.[119] accord better understand role wildfir play environment, nation park servic land manag agenc develop fire manag plan provid strategi wildfir manag expect best enhanc natur ecosystem.[120] climate[edit] grand teton nation park semi-arid climat wettest month novemb january, mostli form snow. park averag 450 inch (1,100&#160;cm) snow mountain 191 inch (490&#160;cm) valley annually. january, daili temperatur rang averag 26&#160;°f (−3&#160;°c) day 1&#160;°f (−17&#160;°c) night. month july, daili temperatur rang 80 41&#160;°f (27 5&#160;°c). record high 93&#160;°f (34&#160;°c) record low −66&#160;°f (−54&#160;°c). temperatur valley mountain summer averag 1&#160;°f (0.56&#160;°c) cooler everi 1,000&#160;ft (300&#160;m) altitud gained, high altitud pass may remain snow-cov mid-july.[121] thunderstorm common summer, especi mountains; contrast, tornado ever report within park. f4 teton-yellowston tornado high altitud tornado touch northeast park border teton wilder bridger-teton nation forest yellowston nation park.[122] air water quality[edit] grand teton nation park 100&#160;mi (160&#160;km) air distanc major urban industri area, local human activ gener low environment impact surround region. however, level ammonium nitrogen trend slightli upward due deposit rain snow believ origin region agricultur activities.[123] additionally, also slight increas mercuri pesticid detect snow alpin lakes.[123] ozon haze may impact overal visibl levels.[123] grand teton nation park, partnership agencies, erect first air qualiti monitor station park 2011. station design check variou pollut well ozon level weather.[124] 2005 studi water jackson, jenni taggart lake indic three lake virtual pristin water quality.[125] three lakes, taggart lake motor boat prohibited, yet littl differ water qualiti detect three lakes.[125] studi publish 2002, snake river found better overal water qualiti river system wyoming, low level pollut anthropogen sources.[126] recreation[edit] mountaineering[edit] grand teton nation park popular destin mountain rock climber partli mountain easili access road.[127] trail well mark rout summit peak long established, experienc fit, peak climb one day.[128] highest maintain trail climb floor jackson hole 4,000&#160;ft (1,200&#160;m) mountain pass sometim call saddl divides.[71] passes, climb follow rout requir vari skill levels. climber need permit encourag voluntarili regist climb plan nation park servic inform associ itinerary.[129] climb requir overnight stay backcountri requir permit.[130] climber essenti determin skill level encourag take unnecessari risks.[129] exum mountain guides, consid one finest mountain guid servic u.s., well jackson hole mountain guides, offer instruct climb escort less experienc unfamiliar variou routes.[131][132] averag 4,000 climber per year make attempt summit grand teton ascend garnet canyon mountain pass call lower saddle, grand teton middl teton.[133][134] lower saddle, climber often follow owen-spald exum ridg rout top grand teton though 38 distinct rout summit.[127] north face rout summit grand teton world renown climb involv dozen distinct pitch rate grade 5.8 difficulti 3,000-foot (910&#160;m) vertic ascent. connect ridg north grand teton lie mount owen, though lower altitude, peak consid difficult ascend. middl teton anoth popular climb easili summit saddl south teton. well north grand teton lie mount moran, trailhead difficult access ascend. direct south buttress mount moran provid vertic mile climb consid difficult climb u.s. first accomplish 1953.[135] popular climb destin includ buck mountain, symmetri spire, mount saint john, mount wister, teewinot mountain nez perc peak mountain least six establish rout summits.[127] camp hiking[edit] see also: list hike trail grand teton nation park hiker cross snowfield en rout paintbrush divide. grand teton nation park five front-countri vehicular access campgrounds. largest colter bay gro ventr campgrounds, 350&#160;campsit accommod larg recreat vehicles.[136] lizard creek signal mountain campground 60 86&#160;campsit respectively, smaller jenni lake campground 49 site tent use only. additionally, full hookup recreat vehicl concessionair manag 112&#160;campsit colter bay villag anoth 100 flagg ranch john d. rockefel memori parkway.[136] though front-countri campground open late spring late fall, primit winter camp permit colter bay near visitor center.[136] campsit access foot horseback consid backcountri campsit avail permit only, camp allow backcountri zone year-round. nation park servic combin specif site zone backcountri camp set carri capac overnight stay per zone protect resourc overcrowding.[130] open fire permit backcountri food must store interag grizzli bear committe approv bear-resist container.[130] 2012, four brand bear-resist contain approv use grand teton nation park backcountry.[137] additionally, hiker may use approv bear spray elud aggress bears.[138] park 200&#160;mi (320&#160;km) hike trails, rang difficulti easi strenuous.[139] easiest hike trail locat valley, altitud chang gener minimal. vicin colter bay village, hermitag point trail 9.4&#160;mi (15.1&#160;km) long consid easy.[140] sever trail link hermitag point emma matilda lake two ocean lake trails, also consid rel easi hike jackson lake lodg area.[141] easi hike includ valley trail run trapper lake north south park boundari near teton villag jenni lake trail circl lake. rang moder strenuou difficulty, trail lead canyon rate base distanc importantli amount elev change. greatest elev chang found paintbrush canyon, alaska basin garnet canyon trails, elev increas 4,000&#160;ft (1,200&#160;m) typical.[71] hors pack anim permit almost trail park, howev five design backcountri camp locat pack anim campsit far high mountain passes.[142] bicycl limit vehicl roadway park widen road provid safer bike experience.[143] pave multi-us pathway open 2009 provid non-motor bike access town jackson south jenni lake.[143] boat fishing[edit] boat anchor colter bay marina grand teton nation park allow boat lake jackson hole, motor boat use jackson jenni lakes. maximum horsepow limit jackson lake (though nois restriction), jenni lake restrict 10&#160;horsepower.[144] non–motor boat permit bearpaw, bradley, emma matilda, leigh, phelps, string, taggart two ocean lakes. four design boat launch locat jackson lake one jenni lake. additionally, sailboats, windsurf water ski allow jackson lake jet ski permit park waterways.[144] boat requir compli variou safeti regul includ person flotat devic passenger.[145] non–motor watercraft permit snake river.[146] waterway park limit boating, includ alpin lake tributari stream snake river.[145] 2010, grand teton nation park start requir boat display aquat invas speci decal issu wyom game fish depart yellowston nation park boat permit.[145] effort keep park waterway free variou invas speci zebra mussel whirl disease, boater expect abid certain regul includ display self-certif complianc dashboard vehicl attach empti boat trailer.[147][148] grand teton nation park fisheri manag wyom fish game depart wyom state fish licens requir fish waterway grand teton nation park.[105][149] creel limit trout restrict six per day, includ three cutthroat trout none longer 12&#160;in (30&#160;cm), maximum length trout speci may exceed 20&#160;in (51&#160;cm), except taken jackson lake, maximum allow length 24&#160;in (61&#160;cm). also restrict season access certain area well type bait fish tackl permitted.[149] winter activities[edit] left right, nez perce, grand teton mount owen winter visitor allow snowsho cross-countri ski restrict trails.[150] teton park road taggart lake trailhead signal mountain campground close vehicular traffic winter section road groom ski snowsho traffic.[151] park servic offer guid snowsho tour daili main headquart locat moose, wyoming.[150] overnight camp allow winter backcountri permit visitor inquir avalanch dangers.[150] locat grand teton nation park snowmobil permit jackson lake.[152] nation park servic requir snowmobil use "best avail technology" (bat) list variou model snowmobil permitted, deem provid least amount air pollut maxim nois abatement. snowmobil must less 10&#160;year old odomet read less 6,000&#160;mi (9,700&#160;km).[152] additionally, snowmobil use purpos access ice fish locat only.[153] snowmobil access permit moran junction flagg ranch adjac john d. rockefeller, jr. memori parkway travel use continent divid snowmobil trail could travers bridger-teton nation forest yellowston nation park. however, 2009, winter use planner close sinc unguid snowmobil access yellowston nation park also discontinued.[153] tourism[edit] visitor centers[edit] craig thoma discoveri &amp; visitor center moose, wyom craig thoma discoveri visitor center adjac park headquart moose, wyoming, open year round. open 2007 replac old, inadequ visitor center, facil name late u.s. senat craig thomas. financ combin feder grant privat donations.[154] adjoin 154-seat auditorium open public april 2011.[155] north colter bay villag jackson lake, colter bay visitor center &amp; indian art museum open begin may earli october. colter bay visitor center &amp; indian art renov project complet center portion art collect made avail view center open season may 2012.[158] south moos moose–wilson road, lauranc s. rockefel preserv center locat land privat own lauranc s. rockefel situat phelp lake. donat grand teton nation park open public 2008, properti part jy ranch, first dude ranch jackson hole.[159] jenni lake, jenni lake visitor center open mid–may mid–september. visitor center within jenni lake ranger station histor district structur photograph harrison crandal construct art studio 1920s.[160] signal mountain lodg accommodations[edit] contract total 385 rooms, meet facilities, retail shop restaurant. grand teton lodg compani also manag jenni lake lodge, consist cabin restaur colter bay village, cabins, restaurant, groceri store, laundri marina.[162] south jackson lake dam, signal mountain lodg manag forev resort provid cabins, marina, ga station restaurant.[163] american alpin club hostel dormitori style accommod primarili reserv mountain climber grand teton climber' ranch.[164] adjac snake river moose, wyoming, dornan' inhold privat land year-round cabin accommod relat facilities.[165] lodg also avail triangl x ranch, anoth
